about_the_game:
About This

Memory Distortion is a retro 2D platformer game with Victorian pixel art. You shall play as a glitch robot, following the whisper of the remaining memory of its personality prototype, returning to the deepest part of a strange town abandoned for hundreds of years, and uncovering the secrets behind the tower.

Gameplay

Just like all retro platformer games, all you need to do is move and kill. Memory Distortion offers a variety of ways to move: running, jumping, wall sliding, dashing, and designs swift light attack compared to heavy attack with a greater range, all for the sake of a rich gameplay experience. Players need to jump, dash and kill from platform to platform, survive the siege of gothic monsters (either hide or kill them all), reach the streetlight at the endpoint, and go deep into the town.

Features

  • Feel your adrenalin in an instant-death fight. With exquisite pixel scenes and smooth gameplay, enjoy your journey of killing countless gothic monsters, and experience our flexible cambo system (you can switch between light and heavy attack anytime without recovery)!

  • Immersed in our originally dignified but strange music. With a variety of instruments, Memory Distortion provides very creepy emotional experience that is just suitable for our Victorian scenes.

  • Each level has different methods to finish. Make the most of your skills: kill them all, or just sneak into the endpoint? use wall jump or dash? It's all up to you.

How to Play

Use Arrow Keys or WASD to Move, use space to Jump, use j & k to attack, use E to interact, use L to dash.

Please kill the monsters entrenched in the town and interact with the teleportation elevator, find your way to reach the streetlight in the endpoint, uncovering the secrets hidden behind the town.
